thread.title: Foods guaranteed to boost your brain’s productivity (12 Photos)
thread.title_full: Foods guaranteed to boost your brain’s productivity (12 Photos)

author: Travis
title: Foods guaranteed to boost your brain’s productivity (12 Photos)
text:
Peanut Butter has Vitamin E to protect brain cells and is packed with protein. 5 
Raw Carrots Carrots are high in glucose, a great source of fuel for the brain, and help reduce inflammation. The luteolin in carrots help reduce memory loss. Advertisement 6 
Avocados High in monounsaturated fats to stabilize sugar levels in the body. Avocados have the highest protein and lowest sugar of any other fruit. 7 
Chia Seeds Packed with proteins and Omega 3 fatty acids that keep you focused and produce brain cells. They also help reduce brain inflammation. 8 
Dark chocolate has antioxidants that slow cognitive decline and the caffeine can boost concentration. 9 
Coconut oil increases good cholesterol and has saturated fats to help prevent neurodegenerative diseases. 10 
The amino acids in eggs help keep you focused while choline aids the brain functions. Advertisement
